page.content: Crail Sunday School Trip. One fine Saturday in June, 8 tractors with decorated trailers arrive in the Marketgate and the excited children climb aboard. The best decorated tractor gets the rosette and the driver gets sweets. Trailing streamers and balloons we set off. 30 mins. takes us to th field kindly lent by the farmer and we climb down the ladders and unload bales of hay for seats. The young folk play football and rounders until the ice-cream van arrives, then more games till tea time, 200 children and adults eat crisps, juice, sandwiches & biscuits, tea for adults. After tea races are held with some for the mums and dads, and the tug-of-war. After we clear up the litter and give three cheers it's time for home.
